nodes.text: The short-range assassin's blaster was a model of hold-out blaster equipped with a flash and noise supressor that could be dismantled for easy concealment. Bib Fortuna carried this type of weapon.
Star Wars: The Visual Dictionary first named this weapon, while a still image of the blaster in Star Wars: The Action Figure Archive has a caption that reads, "Blaster from Return of the Jedi."
